body_html:
@yongtang I had to revert this CL, because it turns out it broke with a parallel change to unhide the bazel.rc file -- this exposes a problem where PYTHON_BIN_PATH is not being exported in one of the android CI configurations (because it uses a 'sandboxed' build strategy).

I think @andrewharp may be looking at what we can do here.
body_text:

I think @andrewharp may be looking at what we can do here.
body:
@yongtang I had to revert this CL, because it turns out it broke with a parallel change to unhide the bazel.rc file -- this exposes a problem where PYTHON_BIN_PATH is not being exported in one of the android CI configurations (because it uses a 'sandboxed' build strategy).

I think @andrewharp may be looking at what we can do here.
